channel.title: CVE Feed for brechtvds -- Easy Image Collage
channel.description: The latest CVEs for brechtvds -- Easy Image Collage

item.title: CVE-2024-5863|2024-06-28T14:36:26.845Z -- brechtvds -- easy%20image%20collage
item.description: The Easy Image Collage plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the ajax_image_collage() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.13.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to erase all of the content in arbitrary posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-5863|2024-06-28T03:29:34.561Z -- brechtvds -- easy%20image%20collage
item.description: The Easy Image Collage plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the ajax_image_collage() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.13.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to erase all of the content in arbitrary posts.
